type: ESDC Standard ESDC Service Canada envelopes
short_summary: The Contractor must print and deliver all items in full quantities, according to the SOW
description: The Contractor must accept and fulfill this printing order and is responsible for quality control of the various print products requested as well as the distribution of these products to various final destinations.
full_summary:
# Printing Services for Standard Size ESDC and Service Canada Envelopes

**OMB Number:** PW-22-01008535
**Notice Type:** Invitation to Tender
**Government Contracting Agency:** Employment and Social Development Canada (ESDC)

## Description

The Government of Canada is soliciting bids for the provision of printing services for standard size envelopes of ESDC and Service Canada. Successful bidder will provide printing services for the supply of various envelopes, along with shipping services to deliver printed products to ESDC offices and other locations across Canada.

## Key Commencement Dates

* **Bid Release Date:** September 28, 2022
* **Bid Closing Date:** October 12, 2022, at 14:00:00 (AST)
* **Contracting Agency:** Employment and Social Development Canada
* **Notice Document Accessibility:** Documents available in both official languages (English and French)

## Evaluation Criteria

The bids will be evaluated based on technical merit and price. The contractor must meet all the requirements specified in the Statement of Work and must provide deliverables as specified at Annex “C”. The bidder must respect the delivery date in the Invitation to Tender.

## Key Information Files

* Amendment 1 released on October 5, 2022
* Contracting Entity Address: 142 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, J8X 2K3, Canada

## Important Documents

The following documents are available:
* Annex B (Annex C) RFP DDP 100022211.xlsx
* Amendment 1 RFP 100022211.pdf
* RFP 100022211.pdf
* Amendment 1 Annex B (Annex C) RFP DDP 100022211.xlsx
* Annex A (ADM) RFP DDP 100022211.zip
* Annex A (ISP) RFP DDP 100022211.zip

## Related Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Language of Documents

The documents can be submitted in either language (English or French).

## Contact Information

For any questions, inquiries, or clarifications, please contact:
Rabouin, Mimi
Phone: Not Provided
Email: [nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca](mailto:nc-solicitations-gd@hrsdc-rhdcc.gc.ca)
Address: 140 Promenade du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1
